title: Can Ola Electric become the Maruti Suzuki of electric two-wheelers?
description: Ola Electric, led by Bhavish Aggarwal, leads the e2W market with a 48% share in Q1 FY25, selling 74,068 units. Despite preparing for an IPO and product issues, growth stems from strategic partnerships and pricing. Policy shifts under EMPS cut subsidies, impacting sales. The company must adapt to competition and future e-motorcycle trends.
